column3: [ author ] of @org.schema.Book . Book ( ) filter id =~ " good earth " ;

column2: what awards did the good earth win ?
column3: [ award ] of @org.schema.Book . Book ( ) filter id =~ " good earth " ;

column2: how many pages are in gone with the wind ?
column3: [ numberOfPages ] of @org.schema.Book . Book ( ) filter id =~ " gone with the wind " ;

column2: what language was the gulag archipelago written in ?
column3: [ inLanguage ] of @org.schema.Book . Book ( ) filter id =~ " gulag archipelago " ;

column2: i 'm looking for 1st edition books written in romanian .
column3: @org.schema.Book . Book ( ) filter bookEdition =~ " 1st edition " && inLanguage =~ " romanian " ;
